content: Analyze existing test_port_contracts.py structure and identify port module mappings
Examine existing test_lookup.py and test_observer.py files to understand current state
Create test_read_repository.py with comprehensive ReadRepository contract tests

Validate that all tests run correctly and each file tests exactly one port interface
